date.description: The date on which the analytics data is recorded.

channel_id.description: The unique identifier of the YouTube channel associated with the playlist.

playlist_id.description: The unique identifier of the playlist.

video_id.description: The unique identifier of the video within the playlist.

live_or_on_demand.description: Indicates whether the views are for live streams or on-demand videos.

subscribed_status.description: Indicates whether the viewer was subscribed or unsubscribed to the channel while watching the playlist.

country_code.description: The ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code of the playback location.

playback_location_type.description: The type of playback location, such as 'youtube', 'embedded', or 'app'.

playback_location_detail.description: Additional information about the specific playback location.

views.description: The total number of views for the videos in the playlist.

watch_time_minutes.description: The total watch time of the videos in the playlist, in minutes.

average_view_duration_seconds.description: The average duration of views for the videos in the playlist, in seconds.

playlist_starts.description: The number of times the playlist was initiated to play.

playlist_saves_added.description: The number of times the playlist was saved or added by users.

playlist_saves_removed.description: The number of times the playlist was removed or unsubscribed by users.
